data.name: Mikoshi
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Paper World 2150!


For centuries, the Paper World was safe because the crystal of power protected it, but the crystal was stolen from Mikoshi Temple, and the world is in danger now! Find the missing crystal and save the world!

Twelve levels of dynamic platforming with interesting story, charismatic main character and his friends, ability improvements, epic boss battles, secrets hidden throughout and high quality graphics!

Game Features


  • 1980's Cyberpunk Platformer
  • High Quality Graphics
  • "Comics"-style Game Trailers and Interface Design
  • Run-and-Jump Gameplay
  • Epic Boss Battles
  • Experience System. Gain Xp to Open New Perks
  • Secrets Hidden Throughout
  • Hacking Enemy Drones
  • Interesting Story, Dialogs, Characters
  • Three levels of Difficulty: Normal, Hard, Psycho (for extra-hardcore gamers)
  • Hardcore gameplay challenges
